channel.title: Listen Up Rubber Duck
channel.itunes:subtitle: Listen Up Rubber Duck
channel.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Listen Up Rubber Duck, where we unravel the wonders of science and technology, one amazing episode at a time! Dive into a world where complex concepts become clear, and the future is closer than you think. Join us and ignite your curiosity, as we explore the innovations shaping our world.
channel.description: Welcome to Listen Up Rubber Duck, where we unravel the wonders of science and technology, one amazing episode at a time! Dive into a world where complex concepts become clear, and the future is closer than you think. Join us and ignite your curiosity, as we explore the innovations shaping our world.
channel.googleplay:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande

item.title: James Webb Telescope and Splash
item.itunes:title: James Webb Telescope and splash
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: James Webb Telescope and Splash
item.itunes:summary: The James Webb Space Telescope is the largest optical telescope in space and is the work of NASA, the Canadian Space Agency and the European Space Agency. It is the most complex and powerful space telescope built so far. In this episode I talk about why this is an important development in Science, it’s working principle and how it will enable us to explore the universe.
item.description: The James Webb Space Telescope is the largest optical telescope in space and is the work of NASA, the Canadian Space Agency and the European Space Agency. It is the most complex and powerful space telescope built so far. In this episode I talk about why this is an important development in Science, it’s working principle and how it will enable us to explore the universe.

item.title: Svante Pääbo: 2022 Noble Prize Winner in Medicine
item.itunes:title: Svante Pääbo: 2022 Noble Prize in Medicine Winner
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Svante Pääbo: 2022 Noble Prize in Medicine Winner
item.itunes:summary: Savante Paabo is a swedish geneticist and specializes in evolutionary genetics. He won the Noble prize in medicine for discoveries concerning the genomes of extinct hominins and human evolution. In this episode we discuss his work and contributions to the field of evolutionary genetics that made him win the Noble prize.
item.description: Savante Paabo is a swedish geneticist and specializes in evolutionary genetics. He won the Noble prize in medicine for discoveries concerning the genomes of extinct hominins and human evolution. In this episode we discuss his work and contributions to the field of evolutionary genetics that made him win the Noble prize.

item.itunes:title: Show your true colors!
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande

item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about the magic behind Fall colors!

item.title: Fire On The Mountain!
item.itunes:title: Fire On The Mountain!
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Fire On The Mountain!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about volcanoes, how they erupt and send Splash on an epic journey to find what is inside the Earth's crust - Just in time as the Mauna Lao in Hawaii has been declared to be in 'heightened unrest'.
item.description: In this episode we talk about volcanoes, how they erupt and send Splash on an epic journey to find what is inside the Earth's crust - Just in time as the Mauna Lao in Hawaii has been declared to be in 'heightened unrest'.

item.title: Tech at the 2022 FIFA World cup
item.itunes:title: Tech at the 2022 FIFA World cup
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Tech at the 2022 FIFA World cup
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about technology being used at the 2022 FIFA world cup. I think this is the most advanced football world cup yet - with everything from an advanced motion sensor equipped ball to "cool" cooling technologies.
item.description: In this episode we talk about technology being used at the 2022 FIFA world cup. I think this is the most advanced football world cup yet - with everything from an advanced motion sensor equipped ball to "cool" cooling technologies.

item.title: They paid HOW MUCH for that NFT?!

item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: They paid HOW MUCH for that NFT?!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about the craze behind NFT's and how Starbucks is at the forefront of using this tech to enhance customer experience!
item.description: In this episode we talk about the craze behind NFT's and how Starbucks is at the forefront of using this tech to enhance customer experience!

item.title: THE SKY ISN’T JUST BLUE??!!
item.itunes:title: THE SKY ISN’T JUST BLUE??!!
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: THE SKY ISN’T JUST BLUE??!!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about Northern lights, myths surrouding them, and why they actually happen.
item.description: In this episode we talk about Northern lights, myths surrouding them, and why they actually happen.

item.title: What do you mean the battery is dead??!
item.itunes:title: What do you mean the battery is dead??!
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: What do you mean the battery is dead??!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about Lithium Ion Batteries, our current reliance on them for EV's, future advancemnets and the environmental impact of Lithium mining.
item.description: In this episode we talk about Lithium Ion Batteries, our current reliance on them for EV's, future advancemnets and the environmental impact of Lithium mining.

item.title: Whats with colored Eggs?!
item.itunes:title: Whats with colored Eggs?!
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Whats with colored Eggs?!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about why eggs come in different colors, and how color, nutrition etc is determined based on the breed and diet of the chicken!

item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande

item.title: Echos of Innovation #1 - Nikola Tesla
item.itunes:title: Echos of Innovation #1 - Nikola Tesla
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Echos of Innovation #1 - Nikola Tesla
item.itunes:summary: In this new series we delve into some of the greatest minds that shaped the world we live in today. In this episode we talk about Nikola Tesla - The man who single handedly changed the course of electricity amongst many other things!
item.description: In this new series we delve into some of the greatest minds that shaped the world we live in today. In this episode we talk about Nikola Tesla - The man who single handedly changed the course of electricity amongst many other things!

item.title: Supersonic Saga: The Concorde
item.itunes:title: Supersonic Saga: The Concorde
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Supersonic Saga: The Concorde
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, embark with us on a thrilling journey through time, where we unravel the iconic tale of speed, luxury, and innovation that defined an era.
item.description: In this episode, embark with us on a thrilling journey through time, where we unravel the iconic tale of speed, luxury, and innovation that defined an era.

item.title: From Orchards to Algorithms: Silicon Valley's Rise
item.itunes:title: From Orchards to Algorithms: Silicon Valley's Rise
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: From Orchards to Algorithms: Silicon Valley's Rise
item.itunes:summary: Explore the transformation from humble orchards to tech empire in this episode. Discover how visionaries reshaped a region into the world's innovation powerhouse!
item.description: Explore the transformation from humble orchards to tech empire in this episode. Discover how visionaries reshaped a region into the world's innovation powerhouse!

item.title: Genetic Frontiers: Unleashing the Power of CRISPR
item.itunes:title: Genetic Frontiers: Unleashing the Power of CRISPR
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Genetic Frontiers: Unleashing the Power of CRISPR
item.itunes:summary: This episode delves into the groundbreaking world of gene editing. Explore how CRISPR technology is reshaping medicine, agriculture, and beyond! Join us in uncovering the ethical, scientific, and future implications of this genetic game-changer.
item.description: This episode delves into the groundbreaking world of gene editing. Explore how CRISPR technology is reshaping medicine, agriculture, and beyond! Join us in uncovering the ethical, scientific, and future implications of this genetic game-changer.

item.title: The Unbounded Universe of Stephen Hawking
item.itunes:title: The Unbounded Universe of Stephen Hawking
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: The Unbounded Universe of Stephen Hawking
item.itunes:summary: Journey through the stars and into the life and groundbreaking discoveries of a cosmic legend in this episode. Uncover the secrets of black holes and the origins of our universe, told in a way that bridges the gap between science and wonder. Tune in and be inspired by the story of a mind that explored the infinite, defying the limits of both space and human potential.
item.description: Journey through the stars and into the life and groundbreaking discoveries of a cosmic legend in this episode. Uncover the secrets of black holes and the origins of our universe, told in a way that bridges the gap between science and wonder. Tune in and be inspired by the story of a mind that explored the infinite, defying the limits of both space and human potential.

item.title: Winter Warriors: The Remarkable Ways Animals Brave the Cold
item.itunes:title: Winter Warriors: The Remarkable Ways Animals Brave the Cold
item.itunes:author: Ketaki Bhatkhande
item.itunes:subtitle: Winter Warriors: The Remarkable Ways Animals Brave the Cold
item.itunes:summary: Plunge into the icy world of winter wildlife in our latest episode, 'Winter Warriors: The Remarkable Ways Animals Brave the Cold.' Discover astounding survival tactics, from bears in deep hibernation to frogs that freeze and thaw. Join us as we unveil the secret lives of nature's most resilient inhabitants against the harshest of winters

Join us as we unveil the secret lives of nature's most resilient inhabitants against the harshest of winters
